intro: Covilhamia, commonly known as the African violet, is a genus of flowering plants native to tropical Africa. These plants are characterized by their attractive, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors, including purple, pink, and white. Covilhamia species typically have thick, waxy leaves that help them retain moisture in their native habitats.
